name: Veer Kalla
text: The movie was an absolute pleasure to watch.

name: Something
text: I was completely immersed in the story.

name: Amira Buch
text: The movie kept me guessing until the very end. The acting was top-notch, especially from the lead actor. The story was so gripping, I couldn't tear myself away.

name: Gokul Batta
text: The movie was a true joy to watch.

name: Kaira Banerjee
text: The writing was sharp and witty. The ending was so satisfying.

name: Baiju Sahota
text: The movie was an absolute delight from start to finish.
